feature_model.name: Telecommunication_System

meta.data: This feature models describes the features of a simple telecommunication system

Alexander Felfernig, Gerhard Friedrich, Dietmar Jannach, and Markus Zanker. Towards distributed configuration. In KI ?01: Proceedings of the Joint Ger- man/Austrian Conference on AI, pages 198?212, London, UK, 2001. Springer-Verlag

feature_model.feature_tree: :r tecom(_id_0) :o ipvoice(ipvoice) :m software(_id_1) :g (_id_2) [1,1] : swpack1(swpack1) : swpack2(_id_3) :m rack(_id_4) :m sizes(_id_5) :g (_id_6) [1,1] : large(_id_7) : medium(_id_8) : small(_id_9) :o messaging(messaging) :o upgrade_swpack(upgrade_swpack)
feature_model.constraints: c1:~swpack1 or ~upgrade_swpack c2:~ipvoice or ~messaging or upgrade_swpack
